name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive expertise, I specialize in developing robust solutions utilizing **TypeScript**, **React**, **C#**, and **.NET**, while leveraging cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS**. My proficiency in CI/CD processes and tools, including **Terraform**, ensures efficient deployment and maintenance of applications, while my experience with **Kubernetes** enhances scalability and orchestration of applications.

I excel in designing and implementing asynchronous services and stream processing architectures that meet the unique demands of digital identity, open banking, and compliance with industry standards. My background in integrating AI capabilities into applications positions me as a proactive contributor to innovative projects, driving intelligent automation and data processing.

In addition to my technical skills, I possess a strong foundation in Agile methodologies, allowing me to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams through user stories and design documents. My strong communication skills complement my technical strengths, enabling seamless collaboration and the delivery of enterprise-grade solutions in fast-paced environments.
